Edits.Value:
Attached to the Modular Miner.
Increases the power required by the Modular Miner.
Tough enough to mine any ore.
Changes the standard extraction rate of both outputs to 120 / min each.

All mining bonuses ('Mining Efficiency') are directly applied to the extraction rate of the miner.
Example: 50% x 120 / min = 60 / min per output.

NOTE: Node purity counts towards the mining bonus and NOT towards the base extraction rate.
